name: @nocobase/plugin-notification-manager
description: The Notification Manager Plugin is a versatile tool designed to streamline and enhance your application's notification system. It provides a centralized interface to manage, customize, and deliver notifications.Designed for extensibility, it enables easy customization and expansion to meet your growing needs.
description.zh-CN: 通知管理插件是一个多功能工具，旨在简化和增强您的应用程序通知系统。它提供了一个集中式界面，用于管理、自定义和传递通知。设计用于可扩展性，它可以轻松定制和扩展，以满足您不断增长的需求。
